name: The peanut effect.
description:
Controls:

Arrows - Move

Z - Interact/read text

X - Jump/shoot (only at certain times)

-The story so far-

You're on board the S.S Sveld, a ship taking the not-so-brightest to the first colony on mars.

All seems to be going smooth until something happens that throws the crew off their feet.. The captain is MURDERED, and it's up to you to find out who the killer is in an adventure full of dark humour and pop culture references!

-FeedBack-

If you have any feedback you would be willing to give us, please fill the form through Here.
